name: Stillborn (rollinorama)
description:
[STRONGLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN SIZE]

Please, kill the stillborn.  And when the night closed your eyes, I read upon your lips: "This is not today. Not even tomorrow."

You are always a step ahead of your enemies, if you do something, they will do as well right after you. Use the mouse and point at yourself, objects or enemies to act. Here`s some possible actions:

Also, you only can shoot enemies when the turn color combines with the enemy silhouette:

Credits:

Bruno Rollin - Programming, art, game design, music and some SFX.

SFX - Envato Elements.

Game made under the theme "Color as mechanics" for #1Jam. Thank you guys!
